metadata.description:
03.17.22

H.

I'm broken again. I feel we can’t go through another of those painful times. And I can't recover. So I am doing what seems the best thing to do, I signed up for XCAPA. You have been in every way all that anyone could be. I can’t fight any longer. You see I can’t even write this well. What I want to say is I owe all the happiness of my life outside to you. I'm sorry, I love you and I'll wait for you inside. 

I don’t think two people could have been happier than we have been...

M.
